about_the_game:
In a future both distant and close, a giant, impenetrable wall divides a country. On one side, prosperity and wealth. On the other, poverty. And you? You're the one set on taking it all down.

Neon Kicks is an action game focused on speed, precision, and narrowly avoiding death. In this game, you'll find:
  • Teleporting shoes! Kick off each shoe individually, and teleport to thrown shoes.
  • A variety of obstacles! Everything in or on the border wall is trying to kill you, so watch out. And you're not the only one inside the wall...
  • Lots of neon! The cyberpunk world is beautifully rendered with neon lighting and particle effects.

  • A variety of obstacles! Everything in or on the border wall is trying to kill you, so watch out. And you're not the only one inside the wall...
  • Lots of neon! The cyberpunk world is beautifully rendered with neon lighting and particle effects.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Neon Kicks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In Neon Kicks, you’ll take down a border wall or die trying. Using teleporting light-up shoes, shut down as many of the border wall defenses as you can.
